name: Physics Drop Countdown
summary:
Push the ball into the U by drawing lines and polygons... but be quick or you won't level up to the next physics challenge! You have less than 2 minutes to find the formula to get the ball into the U basket. 
 
HOW IT WORKS 
 
- Draw as many lines or polygons as needed. 
- Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity. 
- Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines. 
- All the physics problems have a limited time to be solved. 
- Time limits have been carefully calculated to be challenging taking into account each level's difficulty. 
- Time limits can range from 5 and 18 seconds to 2 minutes. 
- A countdown timer will feature the available time to complete each physics problem. 
- If you need more time to complete a physics problem, you can use the Timex2 button. 
 
A free educational game with 100 physics puzzles to clear, Physics Drop Countdown provides hours of fun.
